title: New Maxxis Receptor semi-slick gravel tire brings fast rolling 650b & 700c options
content:
Riding mostly pavement, but still want some tread to venture off-road? It may be time to check out the new Maxxis Receptor gravel tire. Semi-slick designs aren’t new, but for Maxxis, the Receptor is a new entry between their all-road Velocita slick, and their popular, all-purpose Rambler gravel tire. As the name would suggest, a […]

The post New Maxxis Receptor semi-slick gravel tire brings fast rolling 650b & 700c options appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
